| HistoryText             = A gang of five or more men in ski masks, the self-declared "Proletariat" considered themselves victims of America's capitalist system.  At a martial arts demonstration by an actor, the took Springdale High School hostage in exchange for a small fortune from Hollywood.  Unfortunately for them, in their rush to get to the gymnasium where it was being held, the Proletariat had shoved their way past [[Robert Baldwin (Earth-616)|Robbie Baldwin]], triggering his Speedball powers.  In this state, he bounced into the middle of the situation, distracting the Proletariat from the crowd enough for the actor to fight and capture the would-be terrorists almost singlehandedly.
